about-me.title: About me

intro.label: I am a {quality-1}, {quality-2} and {quality-3} engineer, graduated in computer science. Initially destined for the paramedical field, I decided to go back to school at 22. I've discovered a passion for {interest-1}, and a great interest in JavaScript/TypeScript {interest-2} development.

about-me.future: My long-term ambition is to be able to join a project with a positive environmental/social impact to align my work with my personal values.
